img_above_text:
![Water Curtain Cave Walkthrough \(25\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Water_Curtain_Cave_Walkthrough_%2825%29.png)
This will also be the time when he starts to glow slightly, indicating that his attacks will begin to differ. You'll now see that when he punches down on the ground, shockwaves will be sent out. You can jump or roll over these to dodge them.
img_below_text:
Along with this move, you'll see that he will sometimes end the combo by keeping his hand in the water after punching down. The ground will start to pulse and he'll pull his first up, causing a shockwave of rocks to go upward.
Two other attacks happen less frequently, but go on for longer and can be more dangerous. The first one is that now and then, he'll flash gold and your attacks will repel.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Water Curtain Cave Walkthrough \(25\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Water_Curtain_Cave_Walkthrough_%2825%29.png)
This will also be the time when he starts to glow slightly, indicating that his attacks will begin to differ. You'll now see that when he punches down on the ground, shockwaves will be sent out. You can jump or roll over these to dodge them."
        - Following Text: "Along with this move, you'll see that he will sometimes end the combo by keeping his hand in the water after punching down. The ground will start to pulse and he'll pull his first up, causing a shockwave of rocks to go upward.
Two other attacks happen less frequently, but go on for longer and can be more dangerous. The first one is that now and then, he'll flash gold and your attacks will repel."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a powerful attack is occurring, causing rocks to rise from the ground, likely as part of a shockwave effect. This visual is associated with a boss character who, during the battle, performs a move that sends shockwaves and causes rocks to erupt from the ground, as described in the surrounding text. The image serves to illustrate the dramatic and intense nature of this attack within the game's narrative.
